title: Critical and Creative Thinking Competency Enhancement Program Based on Virtual Environments

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental digital device proficiency and leadership experience
context.additional_context: A process where administrators learn critical thinking and creative problem-solving strategies by addressing real-world social issues in virtual environments

learning_goals: Through virtual scenario analysis, learners can apply critical thinking strategies to systematically evaluate complex social issues.
In VR-based simulations, learners can propose innovative solutions by generating and executing creative ideas.
Using reflective judgment and self-regulation skills, learners can evaluate decision-making processes and derive improvement strategies.

resources: BYOD (Bring Your Own Device) Ready Content

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
